ruling: - If you chain [[Mystical Space Typhoon]] to [[Archlord Zerato]]'s effect and destroy [[The The Sanctuary in the Sky]], [[Archlord Zerato]]'s effect disappears because [[Archlord Zerato]]'s effect needs [[The The Sanctuary in the Sky]] on the field when the effect resolves, not just when it activates (just like [[The Agent of Judgment - Saturn]]).
- You can activate [[Archlord Zerato]]'s effect even if [[The The Sanctuary in the Sky]] is not on the field, but the effect will not resolve.
- You can activate [[Archlord Zerato]]'s effect multiple times in the same turn.
